title: 36: Mom Sex (for everyone)!
itunes:title: 36: Mom Sex (for everyone)!
description:
Dana B. Myers (author of “The Mommy Mojo Makeover”) joins The Broads to talk all about sex, motherhood, confidence, self love, and priorities! They chat the “mom zone”, sexing up your space, choosing fun, sexy “sessions”, and much more! 
Go to www.danabmyers.com (http://www.danabmyers.com/) to find out more about her workshops and to purchase her book! 
Chatty Broads is produced and recorded at @theblueroommedia  
theblueroommedia.com (http://theblueroommedia.com/)
*** ROTHY’S: Go to Rothys.com/ (http://rothys.com/) chatty to get your new favorite flats!
*** OPENFIT: Get a special extended 30-day free trial membership to Openfit by texting Chatty to 303030!
*** ARTICLE: Go to http://article.com/chatty to get $50 off your first purchase of $100 or more!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
